official_title: A bill to name the U.S. Post Office, Courthouse and Federal Building in Gainesville, Florida the "D. R. (Billy) Matthews Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office, Courthouse, and Federal Building in Gainesville, Florida, as the D.R. (Billy) Matthews Federal Building.
